title: Insane Login Queue Times
body: I logged out of the EU West server because the shop was bugged out and wouldn't load in for me. I try to log back in only to find that I have to wait in the 20,000 person queue, which would be fine, except its cycled me back to the end of the queue about SIX times now. What is the point in waiting in a queue if you're just going to send me back to the end of the line regardless of if I wait the 4 minutes or whatever?

replies.body:
Position in queue over 20k
Approximate wait time: 65h 2min
....
Riot please fix your goddamn game.

https://gyazo.com/306529817f9fffd6fe84ff07fd9cab35

^^ Up this and we might get them to see this :)
Rocking at 67
68 for me :‘D

>fix your goddamn game

uh?
In League of Legends server status you can read that they were applying a maintenance fix. So they're aware of this already XD

Now there is a maintenance notification.

"The platform is currently unavailable while we perform emergency maintenance."

Does this mean that they're trying to fix this ? Probably.

Edit: Now my approximate wait time is at 69 hours and 20 minutes.

It happened to me after the post match status won't load, so I skipped it and had a bad player go by unreported, np. I click on the hextech crafting panel and it doesn't load either. Logged out just to find out I need to wait in a long line of 20k players. 

The client is seriously terrible. It is overloaded uncountable bugs every week and some has been around since its release without any possible fixes. Its insanely incompetent!
happened to me too. thats why im here. looking for answers.
the exact same thing happened to me
Same here. Portugal. EU WEST stuck infinite on login 20 min then goes up to 40 min and 20 000 people to login.
67 hours and 44 minutes to login

same thing here, went to log in, it was at 300 people in queue, i said fine, waited and when i reached 1st position it just went back to 300, closed the client thinking it was a bug to just find out that now i had to wait 13000, closed again and reopened, now it's over 20000. doesn't metter how long i wait, it jumps back up after a while. EUW servers are so bugged smh
Rito ty kurwo jebana

Are you kidding...?? 
Game bugged out right before locking in and now I got penalty and position in queue over 30k..

I've just started playing, but I guess that these problems are common, so it's not worth it.. ''good'' job RIOT.

I guarantee you whatever the approximate is will be wrong, whether its predicting sooner or later.

I had to login to PBE multiple times when TFT was hot and it'd predict 20 hours - actually is 4.  Predict 3 hours - actually is 6.  Predict 24 hours - actually is 12.  The estimate on where you are in the queue and how long you have to wait is just going to be wildly wrong.

A big factor involved is that there's a cap of how many they can have logged in and people need to log out to make space, so at the end you'll see your position hit 1 then bounce back to 40.  You're actually at 1 or close and ready to login, but there's no space on the server.
15 min for me, but I think sheduler is a liar)
xD
